subject: Football
Families and Family Life
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Ben Moffitt has evolved into one of college football’s top linebackers and South Florida, a commuter university that first fielded a team 11 years ago, has found a spot alongside the nation’s elite.
